description: Today's word is simple and easy to use. All you have to do is ask for today's word and this skill will give you today's word, example's of the word in use, and a fun fact about the word.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask today's word for a word
Alexa, ask today's word for a new word of the day
name: Today's Word
shortDescription: A skill that gives you a new word to learn every day.
